name: Fumbling player
description:
My production for the GMTK game jam 2022.

You are a tabletop player, and your monk character needs to reach high in the clouds to win. But your DM keeps making you roll every second. Stop the dice for a few seconds, and try to get to the end of the game as fast as possible.

Controls :

right/left arrow = move right or left

Up arrow = jump

spacebar = fix the value of the dice for 5 seconds.
